summary: not really a fix but gets the job done for now
descriptionHtml:
judging by the vast numbers of dead slaughter fish i would say some 1 probably poisoned the water with slaughter fish seeking poison.

ok now on a more serious note,
I figured that while i can\'t add underwater fighting, and i don\'t know of any mods for it, least i can do is kill the main thing that would try to attack you while swimming, before it can attack.

v2 in the works I am planning on a new fix that kills them quickly but still lets you collect from them
author: chet
